alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cameron and southwestern Calcasieu Parishes, east central Jefferson and southeastern Orange Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Orange to near Port Arthur. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Arthur, Orange, Groves, Port Neches, Bridge City, West Orange, Sabine Pass, Pinehurst and Toomey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 876. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
